Exceptions

exceptions - Exception classes for USPTO API clients

This module provides exception classes for USPTO API clients.

exception pyUSPTO.exceptions.USPTOApiAuthError(message, status_code=None)[source]

Bases: USPTOApiError

Authentication error.

exception pyUSPTO.exceptions.USPTOApiError(message, status_code=None)[source]

Bases: Exception
